p: In addition, comparison of the amino acid (AA) sequence coding for ORF1 with the sequence of the prototype strain GII.P16/GII.4 (LC175468) identified 36 AA changes in the ORF1 gene, 11 of which had not yet been described in the literature ( Supplementary Table S2). We found mutations in non-structural proteins such as p48, p22, and RdRp. Additionally, eleven of these non-synonymous changes modified the chemical nature and polarity of the AAs ( Supplementary Table S2).
